attributes.action: Equal rights for gays in schools education environments
attributes.additional_details:
For children to be able to show there sexuality with out abuse from students in school , the action that the government should take ? They should set out a new set of guidelines for equal rights and tackle homophobic. abuse

There should be 1 rule that all schools should follow and a set of guidelines that state the kind of homophobic abuse and the punishment that should be given , this should be a set rule and not one that schools should choose to follow
